Translations.Text: tara paraspare ki bisaye jijnasabada karache
maha sambada samparke
ye samparke tara matanaikya kare.
Na, sattbara'i tara janate parabe
atahpara na, satbara tara janate parabe.
Ami ki karini bhumike bichana
ebam parbatamalake pereka
ami tomaderake jora jora srsti karechi
tomadera nidrake karechi klanti durakari
ratrike karechi abarana.
Dinake karechi jibika arjanera samaya
nirmana karechi tomadera mathara upara majabuta sapta-akasa.
Ebam ekati ujjbala pradipa srsti karechi.
Ami jaladhara meghamala theke pracura brstipata kari
yate taddbara utpanna kari sasya, udbhida.
O pataghana udyana.
Niscaya bicara dibasa nirdharita rayeche.
Yedina singaya phumka deya habe, takhana tomara dale dale samagata habe.
Akasa bidirna haye; tate bahu daraja srsti habe.
Ebam parbatamala calita haye maricika haye yabe.
Niscaya jahannama pratiksaya thakabe
simalanghanakaridera asrayasthalarupe.
Tara tathaya satabdira para satabdi abasthana karabe.
Tathaya tara kona sitala ebam paniya asbadana karabe na
kintu phutanta pani o pumja pabe.
Paripurna pratiphala hisebe.
Niscaya tara hisaba-nikasa asa karata na.
Ebam amara ayatasamuhe puropuri mithyaropa karata.
Ami sabakichu'i lipibad'dha kare sanraksita karechi.
Ata'eba, tomara asbadana kara, ami kebala tomadera sasti'i brd'dhi karaba.
Paraheyagaradera jan'ye rayeche saphalya.
Udyana, angura
samabayaska, purnayaubana taruni.
Ebam purna panapatra.
Tara tathaya asara o mithya bakya sunabe na.
Eta apanara palanakartara tarapha theke yathocita dana
yini nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichura palanakarta, dayamaya, ke'u tamra sathe kathara adhikari habe na.
Yedina ruha o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe damrabe. Dayamaya allaha yake anumati dibena, se byatita ke'u katha balate parabe na ebam se satyakatha balabe.
E'i dibasa satya. Atahpara yara iccha, se tara palanakartara kache thikana tairi karuka.
Ami tomaderake asanna sasti samparke satarka karalama, yedina manusa pratyeksa karabe ya se samane prerana kareche ebam kaphera balabeh haya, aphasosa-ami yadi mati haye yetama.
Sapatha se'i pheresataganera, yara duba diye atma utpatana kare
sapatha tadera, yara atmara bamdhana khule deya mrdubhabe
sapatha tadera, yara santarana kare drutagatite
sapatha tadera, yara drutagatite agrasara haya ebam
sapatha tadera, yara sakala karmanirbaha kare, keyamata abasya'i habe.
Yedina prakampita karabe prakampitakari
atahpara pascate asabe pascadagami
sedina aneka hrdaya bhita-bihabala habe.
Tadera drsti nata habe.
Tara baleh amara ki ulato paye pratyabartita haba'i
galita asthi haye ya'oyara para'o
tabe to e pratyabartana sarbanasa habe
Ata'eba, eta to kebala eka maha-nada
takhana'i tara mayadane abirbhuta habe.
Musara brttanta apanara kache paucheche ki
yakhana tara palanakarta take pabitra tuya upyakaya ahabana karechilena
phera'unera kache ya'o, niscaya se simalanghana kareche.
Atahpara balah tomara pabitra ha'oyara agraha ache ki
ami tomake tomara palanakartara dike patha dekhaba, yate tumi take bhaya kara.
Atahpara se take maha-nidarsana dekhala.
Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam aman'ya karala.
Atahpara se pratikara cestaya prasthana karala.
Se sakalake samabeta karala ebam sajore ahabana karala
ebam balalah ami'i tomadera sera palanakarta.
Atahpara allaha take parakalera o ihakalera sasti dilena.
Ye bhaya kare tara jan'ye abasya'i ete siksa rayeche.
Tomadera srsti adhika kathina na akasera, ya tini nirmana karechena
tini eke ucca karechena o subin'yasta karechena.
Tini era ratrike karechena andhakaracchanna ebam era suryoloka prakasa karechena.
Prthibike era pare bistrta karechena.
Tini era madhya theke era pani o ghama nirgata karechena
parbatake tini drrhabhabe pratisthita karechena
tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantudera upakararthe.
Atahpara yakhana mahasankata ese yabe.
Arthat yedina manusa tara krtakarma smarana karabe
ebam darsakadera jan'ye jahannama prakasa kara habe
takhana ye byakti simalanghana kareche
ebam parthiba jibanake agradhikara diyeche
tara thikana habe jahannama.
Paksantare ye byakti tara palanakartara samane dandayamana ha'oyake bhaya kareche ebam kheyala-khusi theke nijeke nibrtta rekheche
tara thikana habe jannata.
Tara apanake jijnasa kare, keyamata kakhana habe
era barnanara sathe apanara ki samparka
era carama jnana apanara palanakartara kache.
Ye eke bhaya kare, apani to kebala take'i satarka karabena.
Yedina tara eke dekhabe, sedina mane habe yena tara duniyate matra eka sandhya athaba eka sakala abasthana kareche.
Tini bhrukuncita karalena ebam mukha phiriye nilena.
Karana, tamra kache eka andha agamana karala.
Apani ki janena, se hayato parisud'dha hata
athaba upadesa grahana karato ebam upadesa tara upakara hata.
Parantu ye beparoya
apani tara cintaya masagula.
Se sud'dha na hale apanara kona dosa ne'i.
Ye apanara kache daure asalo
ematabasthaya ye, se bhaya kare
apani take abajna karalena.
Kakhana'o erupa karabena na, eta upadesabani.
Ata'eba, ye iccha karabe, se eke grahana karabe.
Eta likhita ache sam'manita
ucca pabitra patrasamuhe
lipikarera haste
yara mahat, puta caritra.
Manusa dhbansa hoka, se kata akrtajna
tini take ki bastu theke srsti karechena
sukra theke take srsti karechena, atahpara take suparimita karechena.
Atahpara tara patha sahaja karechena
atahpara tara mrtyu ghatana o kabarastha karena take.
Erapara yakhana iccha karabena takhana take punarujjibita karabena.
Se kakhana'o krtajna hayani, tini take ya adesa karechena, se ta purna kareni.
Manusa tara khadyera prati laksya karuka
ami ascarya upaye pani barsana karechi
erapara ami bhumike bidirna karechi
atahpara tate utpanna karechi sasya
angura, saka-sabji
yayatuna, kharjura
ghana udyana
phala ebam ghasa
tomadera'o tomadera catuspada jantudera upakararthe.
Atahpara yedina karnabidaraka nada asabe
sedina palayana karabe manusa tara bhratara kacha theke
tara mata, tara pita
tara patni o tara santanadera kacha theke.
Sedina pratyekera'i nijera eka cinta thakabe, ya take byatibyasta kare rakhabe.
Aneka mukhamandala sedina habe ujjbala
sahasya o praphulla.
Ebam aneka mukhamandala sedina habe dhuli dhusarita.
Taderake kalima acchanna kare rakhabe.
Tara'i kaphera papisthera dala.
Yakhana surya alohina haye yabe
Yakhana naksatra malina haye yabe
yakhana parbatamala apasarita habe
yakhana dasa masera garbhabati ustrisamuha upeksita habe
yakhana ban'ya pasura ekatrita haye yabe
yakhana samudrake uttala kare tola habe
yakhana atmasamuhake yugala kara habe
yakhana jibanta prothita kan'yake jijnesa kara habe
ki aparadhe take hatya kara hala
yakhana amalanama khola habe
yakhana akasera abarana apasarita habe
yakhana jahannamera agni prajbalita kara habe
ebam yakhana jannata sannikatabarti habe
takhana pratyeke'i jene nibe se ki upasthita kareche.
Ami sapatha kari yesaba naksatragulo pascate sare yaya.
Calamana haya o adrsya haya
sapatha nisabasana o
prabhata agamana kalera
niscaya kora'ana sam'manita rasulera anita bani
yini saktisali, arasera malikera nikata maryadasali
sabara man'yabara, sekhanakara bisbasabhajana.
Ebam tomadera sathi pagala nana.
Tini se'i pheresatake prakasya digante dekhechena.
Tini adrsya bisaya balate krpanata karena na.
Eta bitarita sayatanera ukti naya.
Ata'eba, tomara kothaya yaccha
eta to kebala bisbabasidera jan'ye upadesa
tara jan'ye, ye tomadera madhye soja calate caya.
Tomara allaha rabbula alaminera abhiprayera ba'ire an'ya kichu'i iccha karate para na.
Yakhana akasa bidirna habe
yakhana naksatrasamuha jhare parabe
yakhana samudrake uttala kare tola habe
ebam yakhana kabarasamuha um'mocita habe
takhana pratyeke jene nibe se ki agre prerana kareche ebam ki pascate chere eseche.
He manusa, kise tomake tomara mahamahima palanakarta samparke bibhranta karala
yini tomake srsti karechena, atahpara tomake subin'yasta karechena ebam susama karechena.
Yini tomake tamra icchamata akrtite gathana karechena.
Kakhana'o bibhranta hayo na; baram tomara dana-pratidanake mithya mane kara.
Abasya'i tomadera upara tattbabadhayaka niyukta ache.
Sam'manita amala lekhakabrnda.
Tara jane ya tomara kara.
Satkarmasilagana thakabe jannate.
Ebam duskarmira thakabe jahanname
tara bicara dibase tathaya prabesa karabe.
Tara sekhana theke prthaka habe na.
Apani janena, bicara dibasa ki
atahpara apani janena, bicara dibasa ki
yedina ke'u kara'o kona upakara karate parabe na ebam sedina saba katrꦣ2468;ba habe allahara.
Yara mape kama kare, tadera jan'ye durbhoga
yara lokera kacha theke yakhana mepe neya, takhana purna matraya neya
ebam yakhana lokaderake mepe deya kimba ojana kare deya, takhana kama kare deya.
Tara ki cinta kare na ye, tara punarut'thita habe.
Se'i mahadibase
yedina manusa damrabe bisba palanakartara samane.
Eta kichute'i ucita naya, niscaya papacaridera amalanama sijjine ache.
Apani janena, sijjina ki
eta lipibad'dha khata.
Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera
yara pratiphala dibasake mithyaropa kare.
Pratyeka simalanghanakari papistha'i kebala eke mithyaropa kare.
Tara kache amara ayatasamuha patha kara hale se bale, purakalera upakatha.
Kakhana'o na, baram tara ya kare, ta'i tadera hrdaya marica dhariye diyeche.
Kakhana'o na, tara sedina tadera palanakartara theke pardara antarale thakabe.
Atahpara tara jahanname prabesa karabe.
Erapara bala habe, eke'i to tomara mithyaropa karate.
Kakhana'o na, niscaya satlokadera amalanama ache illiyyine.
Apani janena illiyyina ki
eta lipibad'dha khata.
Allahara naikatyaprapta pheresatagana eke pratyaksa kare.
Niscaya satlokagana thakabe parama arame
sinhasane base abalokana karabe.
Apani tadera mukhamandale sbacchandyera sajibata dekhate pabena.
Taderake mohara kara bisud'dha paniya pana karano habe.
Tara mohara habe kasturi. E bisaye pratiyogidera pratiyogita kara ucita.
Tara misrana habe tasanimera pani.
Eta ekata jharana, yara pani pana karabe naikatyasilagana.
Yara aparadhi, tara bisbasiderake upahasa karata.
Ebam tara yakhana tadera kacha diye gamana karata takhana paraspare cokha tipe isara karata.
Tara yakhana tadera paribara-parijanera kache phirata, takhana'o hasahasi kare phirata.
Ara yakhana tara bisbasiderake dekhata, takhana balata, niscaya era bibhranta.
Athaca tara bisbasidera tattbabadhayakarupe prerita hayani.
Aja yara bisbasi, tara kapheraderake upahasa karache.
Sinhasane base, taderake abalokana karache
kapherara ya karata, tara pratiphala peyeche to
yakhana akasa bidirna habe
o tara palanakartara adesa palana karabe ebam akasa era'i upayukta
ebam yakhana prthibike samprasarita kara habe.
Ebam prthibi tara garbhasthita sabakichu ba'ire niksepa karabe o sun'yagarbha haye yabe.
Ebam tara palanakartara adesa palana karabe ebam prthibi era'i upayukta.
He manusa, tomake tomara palanakarta paryanta pauchate kasta sbikara karate habe, atahpara tara saksat ghatabe.
Yake tara amalanama dana hate deya habe
tara hisaba-nikasa sahaje haye yabe
ebam se tara paribara-parijanera kache hrstacitte phire yabe
ebam yake tara amalanama pithera pascaddika theke deya, habe
se mrtyuke ahabana karabe
ebam jahanname prabesa karabe.
Se tara paribara-parijanera madhye anandita chila.
Se mane karata ye, se kakhana'o phire yabe na.
Kena yabe na, tara palanakarta to take dekhatena.
Ami sapatha kari sandhyakalina lala abhara
ebam ratrira, ebam tate yara samabesa ghate
ebam candrera, yakhana ta purnarupa labha kare
niscaya tomara eka simri theke areka simrite arohana karabe.
Ata'eba, tadera ki hala ye, tara imana ane na
yakhana tadera kache kora'ana patha kara haya, takhana sejada kare na.
Baram kapherara era prati mithyaropa kare.
Tara ya sanraksana kare, allaha ta janena.
Ata'eba, taderake yantranadayaka sastira susambada dina.
Kintu yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare, tadera jan'ya rayeche aphuranta puraskara.
Sapatha graha-naksatra sobhita akasera
ebam pratisruta dibasera
ebam se'i dibasera, ye upasthita haya o yate upasthita haya
abhisapta hayeche garta oyalara arthat
aneka indhanera agnisanyogakarira
yakhana tara tara kinaraya basechila.
Ebam tara bisbasidera sathe ya karechila, ta niriksana karachila.
Tara taderake sasti diyechila sudhu e karane ye, tara prasansita, parakranta allahara prati bisbasa sthapana karechila
yini nabhomandala o bhumandalera ksamatara malika, allahara samane rayeche sabakichu.
Yara mumina purusa o narike nipirana kareche, atahpara ta'oba kareni, tadera jan'ye ache jahannamera sasti, ara ache dahana yantrana
yara imana ane o satkarma kare tadera jan'ye ache jannata, yara taladese prabahita haya nirjharinisamuha. Eta'i mahasaphalya.
Niscaya tomara palanakartara pakara'o atyanta kathina.
Tini'i prathamabara astitba dana karena ebam punaraya jibita karena.

mahana arasera adhikari.
Tini ya cana, ta'i karena.

baram yara kaphera, tara mithyarope rata ache.

la'ohe mahaphuye lipibad'dha.

Pratyekera upara ekajana tattbabadhayaka rayeche.

Se srjita hayeche sabege skhalita pani theke.
Eta nirgata haya merudanda o baksapajarera madhya theke.
Niscaya tini take phiriye nite saksama.
Yedina gopana bisayadi pariksita habe

ebam bidaranasila prthibira
niscaya kora'ana satya-mithyara phayasala.
Ebam eta upahasa naya.

ara ami'o kausala kari.

atahpara karechena take kala abarjana.
Ami apanake patha karate thakaba, phale apani bismrta habena na
allaha ya iccha karena ta byatita. Niscaya tini janena prakasya o gopana bisaya.
Ami apanara jan'ye sahaja sariyata sahajatara kare debo.

ye bhaya kare, se upadesa grahana karabe
ara ye, hatabhaga, se ta upeksa karabe
se maha-agnite prabesa karabe.

ebam tara palanakartara nama smarana kare, atahpara namaya adaya kare.

ibrahima o musara kitabasamuhe.

sapatha dasa ratrira, sapatha tara
ya jora o ya bijora

Apani ki laksya karenani, apanara palanakarta ada bansera irama gotrera sathe ki acarana karechilena
yadera daihika gathana stambha o khumtira n'yaya dirgha chila ebam
yadera samana sakti o balabirye sara bisbera saharasamuhe kona loka srjita hayani
ebam samuda gotrera sathe, yara upatyakaya pathara kete grha nirmana karechila.
Ebam bahu kilakera adhipati phera'unera sathe
yara dese simalanghana karechila.
Atahpara sekhane bistara asanti srsti karechila.
Atahpara apanara palanakarta taderake sastira kasaghata karalena.
Niscaya apanara palakarta satarka drsti rakhena.
Manusa erupa ye, yakhana tara palanakarta take pariksa karena, atahpara sam'mana o anugraha dana karena, takhana bale, amara palanakarta amake sam'mana dana karechena.
Ebam yakhana take pariksa karena, atahpara riyika sankucita kare dena, takhana baleh amara palanakarta amake heya karechena.
Eta amulaka, baram tomara etimake sam'mana kara na.
Ebam misakinake annadane parasparake utsahita kara na.

se balabeh haya, e jibanera jan'ye ami yadi kichu agre prerana karatama
sedina tara sastira mata sasti ke'u dibe na.
Ebam tara bandhanera mata bandhana ke'u dibe na.
He prasanta mana
tumi tomara palanakartara nikata phire ya'o santusta o santosabhajana haye.

Ami e'i nagarira sapatha kari
ebam e'i nagarite apanara upara kona pratibandhakata ne'i.

ami ki take de'ini caksudbaya
jihaba o osthadbaya
bastutah ami take du’ti patha pradarsana karechi.

ta hacche dasamukti
athaba durbhiksera dine annadana.
Etima atbiyake
athaba dhuli-dhusarita misakinake
atahpara tadera antarbhukta ha'oya, yara imana ane ebam parasparake upadesa deya sabarera o upadesa deya dayara.
Tara'i saubhagyasali.
Ara yara amara ayatasamuha asbikara kare tara'i hatabhaga.
Tara agniparibestita abasthaya bandi thakabe.
Sapatha suryera o tara kiranera
sapatha candrera yakhana ta suryera pascate ase
sapatha dibasera yakhana se suryake prakharabhabe prakasa kare
sapatha ratrira yakhana se suryake acchadita kare
sapatha akasera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena, tamra.
Sapatha prthibira ebam yini ta bistrta karechena, tamra
sapatha pranera ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena, tamra
atahpara take tara asatkarma o satkarmera jnana dana karechena
ye nijeke sud'dha kare, se'i saphalakama haya.
Ebam ye nijeke kalusita kare, se byartha manoratha haya.
Samuda sampradaya abadhyata basatah mithyaropa karechila.
Yakhana tadera sarbadhika hatabhagya byakti tatpara haye uthechila.
Atahpara allahara rasula taderake balechilenah allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora byapare satarka thaka.
Atahpara ora tara prati mithyaropa karechila ebam ustrira pa kartana karechila. Tadera papera karane tadera palanakarta tadera upara dhbansa nayila kare ekakara kare dilena.
Allaha ta’ala e'i dhbansera kona birupa parinatira asanka karena na.
Sapatha ratrira, yakhana se acchanna kare
sapatha dinera, yakhana se alokita haya
ebam tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
niscaya tomadera karma pracesta bibhinna dharanera.
Ata'eba, ye dana kare ebam khodabhiru haya
ebam uttama bisayake satya mane kare
ami take sukhera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Ara ye krpanata kare o bepara'oya haya
ebam uttama bisayake mithya mane kare
ami take kastera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Yakhana se adhahpatita habe, takhana tara sampada tara kona'i kaje asabe na.
Amara dayitba patha pradarsana kara.
Ara ami malika ihakalera o parakalera.
Ata'eba, ami tomaderake prajbalita agni samparke satarka kare diyechi.
Ete nitanta hatabhagya byakti'i prabesa karabe
ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
E theke dure rakha habe khodabhiru byaktike
ye atnasud'dhira jan'ye tara dhana-sampada dana kare.
Ebam tara upara kara'o kona pratidanayogya anugraha thake na.
Tara mahana palanakartara santusti anbesana byatita.
Se satbara'i santusti labha karabe.
Sapatha purbahnera
Sapatha ratrira yakhana ta gabhira haya
apanara palanakarta apanake tyaga kareni ebam apanara prati birupa'o hanani.
Apanara jan'ye parakala ihakala apeksa sreya.
Apanara palanakarta satbara'i apanake dana karabena, atahpara apani santusta habena.
Tini ki apanake etimarupe panani? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena.
Tini apanake peyechena pathahara, atahpara pathapradarsana karechena.
Tini apanake peyechena nihsba, atahpara abhabamukta karechena.
Sutaram apani etimera prati kathora habena na
sa'oyalakarike dhamaka debena na.
Ebam apanara palanakartara neyamatera katha prakasa karuna.
Ami ki apanara baksa um'mukta kare de'ini
ami laghaba karechi apanara bojha
ya chila apanara jan'ye atisaya duhsaha.
Ami apanara alocanake samucca karechi.
Niscaya kastera sathe sbasti rayeche.
Niscaya kastera sathe sbasti rayeche.
Ata'eba, yakhana abasara pana parisrama karuna.
Ebam apanara palanakartara prati manonibesa karuna.
Sapatha anjira (dumura) o yayatunera
ebam sina'i prantarastha tura parbatera
ebam e'i nirapada nagarira.
Ami srsti karechi manusake sundaratara abayabe.
Atahpara take phiriye diyechi nica theke nice.
Kintu yara bisbasa sthapana kareche o satkarma kareche, tadera jan'ye rayeche asesa puraskara.
Atahpara kena tumi abisbasa karacha keyamatake
allaha ki bicarakadera madhye srestatama bicaraka nana
patha karuna apanara palanakartara name yini srsti karechena
srsti karechena manusake jamata rakta theke.
Patha karuna, apanara palanakarta maha dayalu
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na.
Satyi satyi manusa simalanghana kare
e karane ye, se nijeke abhabamukta mane kare.
Niscaya apanara palanakartara dike'i pratyabartana habe.
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye nisedha kare
eka bandake yakhana se namaya pare
apani ki dekhechena yadi se satpathe thake.
Athaba khodabhiti siksa deya.
Apani ki dekhechena, yadi se mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
Se ki jane na ye, allaha dekhena
kakhana'i naya, yadi se birata na haya, tabe ami mastakera samanera kesaguccha dhare hemcaraba'i
mithyacari, papira kesaguccha.
Ata'eba, se tara sabhasadaderake ahabana karuka.
Ami'o ahabana karaba jahannamera prahariderake
kakhana'i naya, apani tara anugatya karabena na. Apani sejada karuna o amara naikatya arjana karuna.
Ami eke nayila karechi sabe-kadare.
Sabe-kadara samandhe apani ki janena
sabe-kadara hala eka hajara masa apeksa srestha.
Ete pratyeka kajera jan'ye pheresatagana o ruha abatirna haya tadera palanakartara nirdesakrame.
Eta nirapatta, ya phajarera udaya paryanta abyahata thake.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera chila, tara pratyabartana karata na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asata.
Arthat allahara ekajana rasula, yini abrtti karatena pabitra sahipha
yate ache, sathika bisayabastu.
Apara kitaba praptara ye bibhranta hayeche, ta hayeche tadera kache suspasta pramana asara pare'i.
Taderake echara kona nirdesa kara hayani ye, tara khamti mane ekanisthabhabe allahara ebadata karabe, namaya kayema karabe ebam yakata debe. Eta'i sathika dharma.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera, tara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe thakabe. Tara'i srstira adhama.
Yara imana ane o satkarma kare, tara'i srstira sera.

Tadera palanakartara kache rayeche tadera pratidana cirakala basabasera jannata, yara taladese nirjharini prabahita. Tara sekhane thakabe anantakala. Allaha tadera prati santusta ebam tara allahara prati santusta. Eta tara jan'ye, ye tara palanakartake bhaya kara.
Yakhana prthibi tara kampane prakampita habe
yakhana se tara bojha bera kare debe.
Ebam manusa balabe, era ki hala
Sedina se tara brttanta barnana karabe
karana, apanara palanakarta take adesa karabena.
Sedina manusa bibhinna dale prakasa pabe, yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhano haya.
Atahpara ke'u anu parimana satkarma karale ta dekhate pabe
ebam ke'u anu parimana asatkarma karale ta'o dekhate pabe.
Sapatha urdhbasbase calamana asbasamuhera
atahpara ksuraghate agnibicchuraka asbasamuhera
atahpara prabhatakale akramanakari asbasamuhera
o yara se samaye dhuli utksipta kare
atahpara yara sakradalera abhyantare dhuke pare
niscaya manusa tara palanakartara prati akrtajna.
Ebam se abasya e bisaye abahita
ebam se niscita'i dhana-sampadera bhalabasaya matta.
Se ki jane na, yakhana kabare ya ache, ta ut'thita habe
ebam antare ya ache, ta arjana kara habe
sedina tadera ki habe, se samparke tadera palanakarta sabisesa jnata.
Karaghatakari
karaghatakari ki
karaghatakari samparke apani ki janena
yedina manusa habe biksipta patangera mata
ebam parbatamala habe dhunita rangina pasamera mata.
Ata'eba yara palla bhari habe
se sukhijibana yapana karabe.
Ara yara palla halaka habe
tara thikana habe habiya.
Apani janena ta ki
prajjbalita agni
pracuryera lalasa tomaderake gaphela rakhe
emanaki, tomara kabarasthane pauche ya'o.
Eta kakhana'o ucita naya. Tomara sattbara'i jene nebe.
Atahpara eta kakhana'o ucita naya. Tomara sattbara'i jene nebe.
Kakhana'i naya; yadi tomara niscita janate.
Tomara abasya'i jahannama dekhabe
atahpara tomara ta abasya'i dekhabe dibya pratyaye
erapara abasya'i sedina tomara neyamata samparke jijnasita habe.
Kasama yugera (samayera)
niscaya manusa ksatigrasta
kintu tara naya, yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare ebam parasparake takida kare satyera ebam takida kare sabarera.
Pratyeka pascate o sam'mukhe paranindakarira durbhoga
Ye artha sancita kare o ganana kare
se mane kare ye, tara artha cirakala tara sathe thakabe
kakhana'o na, se abasya'i niksipta habe pistakarira madhye.
Apani ki janena, pistakari ki
eta allahara prajjbalita agni
ya hrdaya paryanta pauchabe.
Ete taderake bemdhe deya habe
lamba lamba khumtite.
Apani ki dekhenani apanara palanakarta hastibahinira sathe kirupa byabahara karechena
tini ki tadera cakranta nasyat kare denani
tini tadera upara prerana karechena jhamke jhamke pakhi
yara tadera upara patharera kankara niksepa karachila.
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trnasadrsa kare dena.
Kora'isera asaktira karane
asaktira karane tadera sita o grismakalina sapharera.
Ata'eba tara yena ebadata kare e'i gharera palanakartara
yini taderake ksudhaya ahara diyechena ebam yud'dhabhiti theke taderake nirapada karechena.
Apani ki dekhechena take, ye bicaradibasake mithya bale
se se'i byakti, ye etimake gala dhakka deya
ebam misakinake anna dite utsahita kare na.
Ata'eba durbhoga sesaba namayira
yara tadera namaya sambandhe be-khabara
yara ta loka-dekhanora jan'ya kare
ebam nitya byabaharyya bastu an'yake deya na.
Niscaya ami apanake ka'osara dana karechi.
Ata'eba apanara palanakartara uddesye namaya paruna ebam korabani karuna.
Ye apanara satru, se'i to lejakata, nirbansa.
Baluna, he kapherakula
ami ebadata karina, tomara yara ebadata kara.
Ebam tomara'o ebadatakari na'o, yara ebadata ami kari
ebam ami ebadatakari na'i, yara ebadata tomara kara.
Tomara ebadatakari na'o, yara ebadata ami kari.
Tomadera karma o karmaphala tomadera jan'ye ebam amara karma o karmaphala amara jan'ye.
Yakhana asabe allahara sahayya o bijaya
ebam apani manusake dale dale allahara dbine prabesa karate dekhabena
Takhana apani apanara palanakartara pabitrata barnana karuna ebam tamra kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya tini ksamakari.
Abu lahabera hastadbaya dhbansa hoka ebam dhbansa hoka se nije
kona kaje aseni tara dhana-sampada o ya se uparjana kareche.
Satbara'i se prabesa karabe lelihana agnite
ebam tara stri'o-ye indhana bahana kare
tara galadese kharjurera rasi niye.
Baluna, tini allaha, eka
allaha amukhapeksi
tini ka'uke janma denani ebam ke'u take janma deyani
ebam tara samatulya ke'u ne'i.
Baluna, ami asraya grahana karachi prabhatera palanakartara
tini ya srsti karechena, tara anista theke
andhakara ratrira anista theke, yakhana ta samagata haya
granthite phumtkara diye jadukarinidera anista theke
ebam hinsukera anista theke yakhana se hinsa kare.
Baluna, ami asraya grahana karitechi manusera palanakartara
manusera adhipatira
manusera ma’budera
tara anista theke, ye kumantrana deya o atnagopana kare
ye kumantrana deya manusera antare
jbinera madhya theke athaba manusera madhya theke.
